mapper.select: select oid,ordernumber,a.name,phone,CONCAT(a.province, a.city, a.county, a.addr) address, a.addr,g.x_name,o.number,g.x_price price,o.number*g.x_price tprice,g.xid, o.createtime,g.x_img img,state,zts,fts,cjts,c.kname,tts,u.username username,u.useremail,beizhu,o.*,a.*,u.* from address a,xiangqing g,orders o,kind c,user u where o.aid = a.id and o.xid = g.xid and o.uid = u.uid and c.kid = g.xid and ordernumber = #{ordernumber}

select oid,ordernumber,a.name,phone,CONCAT(a.province, a.city, a.county, a.addr) address, a.addr,g.x_name,o.number,g.x_price price,o.number*g.x_price tprice,g.xid, o.createtime,g.x_img img,state,zts,fts,cjts,c.kname,tts,u.username username,u.useremail,beizhu,o.*,a.*,u.* from address a,xiangqing g,orders o,kind c,user u where o.aid = a.id and o.xid = g.xid and o.uid = u.uid and c.kid = g.xid and oid = #{oid}

select oid,ordernumber,a.name,phone,CONCAT(a.province, a.city, a.county, a.addr) address, a.addr,g.x_name,o.number,g.x_price price,o.number*g.x_price tprice,g.xid, o.createtime,g.x_img img,state,zts,fts,cjts,c.kname,tts,beizhu,o.*,a.* from address a,xiangqing g,orders o,kind c where o.aid = a.id and o.xid = g.xid and o.uid = #{uid} and o.state = 0 and c.kid = g.xid and oid like #{oid} and o.state = #{state} or o.state = 6 or o.state = 7 order by o.cts desc order by o.zts desc order by o.fts desc order by o.cjts desc order by o.cjts desc order by o.tts desc
